title: Dragonslayer Jarvan IV's lance looks so small
body:
http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-W3-ImS-V9Gk/VLbcoOe14jI/AAAAAAAAhnE/7qDFCG8hJeU/s1600/dragonslayerj4compare.jpg

Seriously Riot, it looks like an ordinary sword, not like A PROUD PRINCE'S LANCE CARRYING THE PRIDE OF DEMACIAAAAAAAAAA.

pls fix it Riot.

replies.body: It is just a different angle. It is the same length.

Pretty sure this is just a perspective illusion.  The lance in the second image is more "head on" like if you were staring down the point of a pencil.  It makes it more difficult to judge its actual length.
It's still the same.... his arm is just tilted outward.

> [{quoted}](name=Sukishoo,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=f2R6WgeA,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-01-14T21:45:21.203+0000)
>
> It's still the same.... his arm is just tilted outward.

No it's not. We clearly can see the difference between the old one and te new one. And it's way smaller than before.
